name: Foxfire Ooze
movement: climb 20 ft., fly 10 ft., swim 20 ft., walk 20 ft.
description: The Foxfire Ooze is a large, amorphous creature that can absorb and deal considerable damage, with a vibrant, otherworldly glow. It has a viscous, gelatinous form that allows it to contort and move through tight spaces.
memorable: Its Lightning Storm ability can devastate opponents when touched or attacked with metal weapons.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting foes and dominate close-quarter encounters.
relations: May be found in cavernous areas or damp environments alongside other oozes or creatures drawn to its electric properties.
environment: Often found in dark, damp locations such as caves or ruins.
strengths: High hit points, immunity to numerous damage types, and ability to surprise opponents.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class and vulnerability to cold damage.
attacks: Makes three pseudopod attacks, each delivering significant bludgeoning and lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Storm, which can deal area damage and punish metal-wielding attackers.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, enabling it to perceive its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: Typically lacks proficiency in any skills due to low Intelligence and Wisdom.
additional_information: Ambusher ability grants advantage on attacks against surprised foes.
Can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch without restriction.
Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks.
Immune to being blinded, charmed, deafened, exhausted, frightened, or prone.
test_queries: mobility and surprise in close quarters
gelatinous monster with lightning storm ability
